title: We Communicate
tech: Next.js, Socket.io, MongoDB, OpenAI API, Redis, PWA
description: A production-grade real-time communication platform featuring PWA integration, AI-powered automated moderation, and native push notifications.
features: PWA integration with Service Workers for offline support and 'Add to Home Screen'
Web Push Notifications for real-time alerts even when the browser is closed
Automated AI Moderation using OpenAI to detect and punish violations
Full Moderator Panel for manual banning, unbanning, and role promotion
Real-time messaging using Socket.io and Redis for socket management
Multi-level punishment system (warnings, temporary and permanent bans)
challenges: Architecting a seamless notification system that bridges WebSockets for active users and Web Push via Service Workers for background users. Solved complex synchronization issues between stateful socket events and stateless PWA background tasks.

title: PC Marketplace
description: Full-stack marketplace application for PC components with role-aware authentication and a structured backend API.
features: Angular frontend consuming a .NET REST API
challenges: Designing a clean separation between frontend and backend while implementing role-based authorization. Focused on clear API boundaries and predictable authentication behavior.

title: Todo App
description: Task management application with secure OAuth authentication and REST-based CRUD operations.
challenges: Integrating Auth0 authentication into a custom backend while keeping the client experience simple and predictable.
